text.title: Lorem ipsum
text.content:
Starter
Tomato Bruschetta Or Garlic Bread Or Mixed Salad Or Chips
Main Course (Pasta)
Lasagna:(Sheets of Pasta with Bolognese sauce and our home made Besciamelle)
Fettuccine Panna e Prosciutto:(Fettuccine pasta whit cream and baked ham)
Spaghetti Carbonara:(Spaghetti pasta with egg, Italian Bacon, Parmesan cheese and black pepper)
Rigatoni all’Amatriciana:(Rigatoni pasta whit tomato sauce, Italian Bacon, Onions and Parmesan Cheese)
Penne all’Arrabiata:(Penne Pasta with tomato sauce,garlic,olive oil and chilli)
Spaghetti al Pomodoro:(Spaghetti Pasta with tomato sauce,Olive Oil and Basil)
